Tests that requests to unresolved origins result in unknown security state and show up in the sidebar origin list.

Group: Main origin
Group: Unknown / canceled

    <SPAN class=url-scheme-unknown >
http
    </SPAN>
    <SPAN class=url-scheme-separator >
://
    </SPAN>
    <SPAN >
unknown
    </SPAN>
</SPAN>

http
</SPAN>
